THE PERFECT GIFT FOR MEN - The guys on your list are sure to cherish the staples in this men's gift set year-round. If you're looking for the perfect stocking stuffers gift for your dad boyfriend husband brother, him, snatch up a Harry's gift set
body.description: Designed for men dealing with serious sweat, Harry’s Odor & Enhanced Sweat Control Extra-Strength Antiperspirant Stick in Redwood keeps you smelling and feeling fresh throughout the day. Our unique formula provides 24-hour odor and enhanced sweat protection, and our Redwood scent includes exhilarating notes of evergreen leaves, sea salt, and sandalwood. It’s brisk, sharp, and woodsy—a scent inspired by real things. The white solid antiperspirant and deodorant stick goes on smoothly, without feeling sticky, and it’s suitable for men with sensitive skin. It’s also made with thoughtful ingredients, including calming ginger root and bisabolol and soothing jojoba oil and allantoin, and without BHT, D5, parabens, or phthalates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Deoderant and Cost Effective
reviews.reviewText: Long lasting effectiveness. Does not irritate my skin. Nice smell that is not over powering. I get about 36 hours of odor control. Does not stain my clothing.Also, I bought a 3 pack in mid August 2023, and in February 2024 I am still on my first stick. I estimate I can go another 2 weeks on the first one. So, 5 months of daily applications on one stick? Every other brand I get maybe a month of applications per stick.Spread out over time this is the most cost effective deoderant I have used in 50 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found a good deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been struggling to find a deodorant I like ever since old spice started giving me chemical burns. I first tried this one in a cardboard tube called “hey humans” or something like that, and it just didn’t work. I smelled like BO as soon as I started sweating. Then I tried Axe (I know that was stupid, but it was the only men’s deodorant that doesn’t have aluminum that wasn’t locked up) and it just made me smell like middle school locker room and BO. So I went on Amazon and found this brand. And (unless they start giving me a negative reaction like old spice did) I think I’ve found the right brand. It works well, it smells good, and I don’t smell like BO!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Harry’s is the way to go
reviews.reviewText: Stop buying Oldspice or big brand names that make you sweat or doesn’t give you long protection. I always used big brands until I started to sweat for no reason while sitting inside. Harry’s finally made me stop sweating and feel confident in smelling good again. Last all day even with working out side. Also affordable as well. 10 out 10 would recommend to get off those heavy aluminum deodorants and try Harry’s.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. Not the most interesting or appealing scents
reviews.reviewText: I think these do a good job with smell and seem to last most of the day. Price is great.Probably wont ever buy again, the scents dont do it for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars stinky as first
reviews.reviewText: In an effort to use more natural products, I switched to this version of the Harry's redwood deodorant. I was using the alumnimum version. At some have mentioned, the first few weeks was a bit rough for me- I'm normally not a sweater, but I was STANKY even having put this on. After a month of my body adjusting to this alumnimum-free deodorant, I'm not stanky anymore. There may be a adjustment period... stick with it and it'll work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smells Good - At first
reviews.reviewText: I have struggled to find a deodorant that I can consistently utilize that both controls odors as well as perspiration. I have used Harry's deodorant for the last year with a LOT of success and absolutely love it, so when my local store stopped carrying it and I couldn't find it anywhere else, I was pretty upset. Cue finding it on Amazon for substantially less than the store was selling it for--I had to buy it.Only problem was, I didn't notice this was the gel version and not the powder version (powder version is a darker blue color). I accidentally ordered the three pack of the gel and decided to give it a try anyway because I paid for it and the smells were nice. I used the Fig scent the first day.Cue the worst body odor I have ever had in my life. I didn't even realize it was me because I have NEVER smelled the way I do after utilizing this product and I don't know what happened.I've never had bad body odor, only issues with sweating too much in specifically my underarms when it's hot. For whatever reason, I have absolutely horrific, foul smelling armpits after an hour of putting this product on. I took a shower, completely washed myself off, and went to bed with nothing on. Little bit of perspiration as usual, but no body odor at all, even without deodorant on period. The next morning, I decided to give this a go again, hoping something had just gone wrong, and tried Stone, which I have in the powder form and love. Nope. Uh-uh. Within an hour, again, my armpits smell absolutely horrific. I smell like I've been working in a mine for the last four weeks and haven't showered in the entire time. I smell like twenty men working on putting out forest fires.So I washed up again, put on what was left of the powder form, and went to bed with no issues. No smell. No sweat. Decided to try the last scent the next day. I was unfortunately in a hurry and didn't remember to add a different brand to my work bag before heading to work. Now we get to cue the most embarrassing shift of my life as I had to be physically active while wearing a deodorant that had already caused me issues (because I was tired and not thinking of consequences, because I'm smart like that), for ten hours. I was in the bathroom every twenty minutes trying to scrub this off of my armpits, pleading to whatever entity would listen that my coworkers wouldn't notice the smell was coming from me. Unfortunately, the only other deodorant I had with me was the Fig scent I had brought with me to work two days previously, before I realized it was a bad idea. So I was having to put it in my bag, to reapply every twenty minutes in addition to wet wipes I was carrying around to wash off with before reapplying.I don't know what happened. I don't know what reaction occurred with specifically the gel version of Harry's, but I definitely don't recommend it. I will be purchasing the powder form and learned my lesson to always look closer before purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the different scents, but they don't last very long at all. Don't sweat, and you'll be straight.
Excelente producto llegó a tiempo buen precio para evitar viajar al extranjero a comprarlo... Muchas gracias
